title: Masked Raider Collection  Charlton  1955
description:
Golden Age Origin 
Les Wilcox witnessed his Uncle Mort's murder by the hands of Jud Holt who wanted Mort's land. Holt tried to eliminate Les because he witnessed the murder, but Les managed to escape. Wilcox sought refuge in a remote cave and made friends with a wounded eagle, he later named the bird Talon. The pair became a team and hunted down Douglas City's criminals as Talon and the Masked Raider. Les' father was a military man and did not know of his son's double life. In fact, he worried his son was not manly enough. Les had a girlfriend named Polly Garrett, who was the mayor's daughter.

Golden/Silver Age Appearances  
The Masked Raider #1-8, 14-30
The Masked Raider 1-8,10 (Giveaways)
Billy the Kid #30
Cheyenne Kid #30
Outlaws of the West #33,35
Wyatt Earp Frontier Marshal #16

Real Name

Les Wilcox

First Appearance

Masked Raider #1(1955)

Original Publisher

Charlton

Created by

Mike Sekowsky

again, I did my best getting everything available of this character.  enjoy!
